about_the_game:
This is a thrilling arcade game where players slice fruits. It can be played on a PC using a mouse. By moving the cursor across the screen, players simulate a blade to cut fruits, earning points with each successful slice. The objective is to score as many points as possible by cutting as many fruits as you can. Using a mouse provides smooth and responsive control, making the gameplay just as exciting and fast-paced. It's perfect for sharpening reflexes and enjoying quick-action gameplay.

Hentai World Slice with a mouse offers a fresh experience, delivering precise control and swift movements. The game's vibrant visuals and satisfying sound effects. Whether you're chasing a high score or simply having fun slicing fruits, this game offers an addictive, action-packed adventure.

Features:

Light and stylish design

Relaxing soundtrack

Full-screen mode available after game completion

Get ready for an exciting and immersive experience! Forget about time or scores—just enjoy the fun moments and dive into the game's colorful world!

content_descriptors.notes: This is the 2D game. Game have imagines of a sexual and nudity. All characters are fictional and older 18 years.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 3.4 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB

short_description: This arcade game lets players slice fruits with a mouse on a PC. Move the cursor to cut fruits and earn points. The goal is to slice as many as possible for a high score.
